outline:
1. complete, safe, peaceful, perfect, whole, full, at peace
    1. complete
      1. full, perfect
      2. finished
    2. safe, unharmed
    3. peace (of covenant of peace, mind)
      1. perfect, complete (of keeping covenant relation)
kjv_def: full, just, made ready, peaceable, perfect(-ed), quiet, Shalem (by mistake for a name), whole.
